Constants
ViewType

Used to indicate, whether a specific part of the code should run.

PName

In this constant, the Pathologynames are stored so that no strings need to be typed throughout the code.

Functions
getLesson
function getLesson(
callback
)

In this function, a call to getLessonJson is performed. In it, the database is read and the data returned. The data is returned as a JSON and parsed to an object structure.  Finally, the callback function is called.

Parameters
callback

The callback is calling the initControls function in TraineeView or TrainerView respectively.

saveLesson
function saveLesson(
simConfig
)

In this function, the current simConfig is saved. For that purpose, the saveLessonFromJson Method is called.

Parameters
simConfig

Most current simulation config.

saveComment
function saveComment(
comment
)

In this function, a comment from the TrainerView is saved using the saveComment function in the <applicationcontroller.php>.

Parameters
comment

Containing the latest comment.

saveTime
function saveTime(
newTime
)

In this function, the current time from the TrainerView is saved using the saveTime function in the <applicationcontroller.php>.

Parameters
newTime

Containing the current time.

getVitalSignParameters
function getVitalSignParameters(
callback
)

In this function, the default vitalSignParameters are pulled from the database.

Parameters
callback

Will contain the vitalSignParameters.

logout
function logout()

This function invokes the logout operation from the <applicationcontroller.php>.

postValueChange
function postValueChange(
label,
value
)

Used to save value changes in the database.

Parameters
label

Contains the value describtion that was changed.

value

Contains the value that was changed.

addComment
function addComment(
comment
)

This function is used to save comments for the session in the database.

Parameters
comment

Contains the comment to be saved.

Variables
popup
var popup

Stores a reference to the printPDF popup.

Functions
openPrintPopUp
function openPrintPopUp()

Opens the print Popup Dialog in a new window.

createPopup
function createPopup()

Creates a new popup containing the printPDF dialog.

Returns

Returns the created Popup.
